content.rendered:
January Midterm Exam Week at the high school begins on Tuesday, 1/21/25 and runs through Friday, 1/24/25. Linked below please find the exam schedule along with the transportation schedule for the week.

  • Students should only attend school if they have a scheduled exam for the day. The CARE program will operate as normal.  
  • BOCES will continue to hold their regularly scheduled classes that week and transportation will be provided. However, exams take priority over attending BOCES programs. 
  • All Grade 11 students will take the English Language Arts Regents exam scheduled for 8:00 am on Tuesday, 1/21/25.
  • All exams are scheduled for a minimum of two hours. 
  • The high school cafeteria will be open for breakfast and lunch during the exam week. 
  • Students who are scheduled for only an afternoon exam and need transportation, must take the morning bus into school. The library will be open for quiet study during this time.
